data.text:
Street View Panorama Photos

Introduction to Shaanxi Railway Institute

Shaanxi Railway Institute (陕西铁路工程职业技术学院) was founded in 1973, formerly the Weinan Railway Engineering School of the Ministry of Railways, located in the urban area of Weinan, Shaanxi Province. In 2002, it was placed under the Shaanxi Provincial People’s Government. In 2003, it was restructured and upgraded to a higher vocational college. The college has undergone major projects such as the evaluation of outstanding talent training levels by the Ministry of Education, provincial demonstration schools, national backbone colleges, the Ministry of Education’s innovative development action plan, and the construction of new campuses. Vocational school project construction units, the first batch of “1 + X” certificate system pilot units of the Ministry of Education, the first batch of national vocational education teacher teaching innovation team project construction units, the first batch of national higher vocational consultation reform review “effective” colleges, education Ministry of Education “Millions of Exchanges Plan” Chinese project colleges. The college was built for railways and relies on railways for more than 60,000 graduates all over the country, becoming a new force in China’s rail transit construction and management. The college is an important base for China’s high-speed rail construction and management personnel training.

Shaanxi Railway Institute has two campuses, Linwei and Gaoxin, covering an area of 1050 mu, a building area of 409 thousand square meters, a fixed asset of 1.2 billion yuan, a student scale of more than 16,000, and a total value of 115 million yuan in teaching and scientific research equipment. It has a collection of 949,000 books. There are 126 on-campus training bases (rooms) and 315 off-campus training bases, of which the surveying and mapping teaching training base covers an area of 349 acres, 6 production training bases such as high-speed rail, tunnels, and housing construction and virtual simulation training platforms. National leader. Both campuses have standard track and field stadiums, sports centers, table tennis halls, etc., with advanced sports facilities. The student canteen was awarded the title of “standardized student canteen of colleges and universities” by the Education Department. The student apartment has been standardized management, and has been awarded the title of “advanced collective of Shaanxi university student apartments.”

Shaanxi Railway Institute won 7 national teaching achievement awards, 16 provincial teaching achievement awards, 1 national excellent resource sharing course, 13 provincial excellent courses, 4 key majors of national key vocational colleges, and central financial support and promotion 1 professional service industry development capacity building major, 1 Ministry of Education demonstration major, 8 national backbone majors, 12 provincial key majors, 4 professional national teaching standards, 4 national planning textbooks, and provincial excellent textbooks 5 departments, 2 national key construction training bases, 3 national productive training bases, 6 provincial training bases, 2 national “dual-trainer” teacher training bases, and national-level applied technology collaborative innovation 2 centers, 1 national skill master studio, presided over the construction of 2 national professional education teaching resource banks, 6 provincial professional teaching resource banks, and a typical case of the construction of a “double-skilled” teacher team in national vocational colleges , 1 National Party Construction Work Model Branch. The second batch of modern apprenticeship pilot projects passed the acceptance of the Ministry of Education.

Shaanxi Railway Institute specializes in railway engineering, with railway operation management and rail equipment manufacturing as its two wings, and trains highly-skilled technical and skilled personnel for infrastructure construction and management of high-speed rail, urban rail, highway, and construction. There are three secondary colleges of Marxism College, Tiecheng (Innovation) College, Samara School of Transportation, Basic Teaching Department, Continuing Education Department, Physical Education Teaching Department, Railway Engineering Department, Track Engineering Department, Road and Bridge Engineering There are eight professional departments: Department of Surveying and Mapping Engineering, Department of Architectural Engineering, Department of Management Engineering, Department of Mechanical and Electrical Engineering, and Department of Electrical and Information Engineering. Established railway engineering technology, high-speed railway engineering technology, road and bridge engineering technology, underground and tunnel engineering technology, urban rail transit engineering technology, urban rail transit operation management, engineering measurement technology, construction engineering technology, engineering cost, construction engineering supervision, engineering logistics Forty majors including management, railway traffic operation management, construction machinery application technology, automatic control of railway signals, railway locomotive, etc., recruit students nationwide.

Shaanxi Railway Institute has 181 teachers with senior titles and more than 90% of doctoral and graduate students. There are 5 national outstanding or advanced teachers, 4 national industry teachers; 1 Shaanxi Special Support Program teaching teacher, 1 Shaanxi Sanqin craftsman, 11 provincial teaching teachers; 32 teachers in the country Commissioned. In the past five years, teachers have won 24 awards in national teaching competitions, ranking 41st in the national competition rankings published by the Chinese Higher Education Association; in recent years, teachers have published more than 2500 various teaching and research papers, of which SCI , EI, CSCD, CSSCI, etc. included 144 articles, undertaking 123 scientific research projects at the provincial level and Weinan City.

In the past five years, Shaanxi Railway Institute students have won first prizes in surveying and mapping events for five consecutive years in the national vocational college skills competition; they have won the first prize in the third high-speed railway precision measurement and fine-tuning industry skills competition; and they have been awarded the railway category for four consecutive years First Prize in Signal Contest. In the “Internet +” Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition and the “Challenge Cup” extra-curricular academic scientific and technological works competition for students, the total scores of students’ awards are among the top in national railway colleges. He has won provincial championships in sports competitions such as badminton, table tennis, and artistic gymnastics, and participated in national competitions on behalf of Shaanxi and achieved excellent results. Outstanding graduates have been reported in mainstream media in Central China, such as CCTV, Guangming Daily, and Xinhua.com. The most beautiful fighters, the national double-hundred people, and the national model worker Dou Tiecheng have emerged. “Chinese” Xiong Xuan’ai, Zhang Geliang, the champion of railway engineering (high-speed rail line) skill competition, and “two provinces model workers” Tang Zhaoping (Fujian, Jiangxi) and He Qi (Shaanxi, Xinjiang) and other advanced models. In the eight years, seven people were selected into the Shaanxi Provincial College Students’ Advanced Deeds Report.

The college is the preferred school recruited by the National Engineering Bureau and the designated school recruited by the 18 railway bureau groups. The employment rate has remained above 96% for 16 consecutive years. The third-party Xi’an Jiaotong University College Research Center released the province’s employment competitiveness ranking for colleges and universities. The quality is rated A +, and the average monthly income ranks first in the provincial vocational level. A third-party evaluation agency, McCos, revealed that the seven indicators of college graduates’ employment quality are higher than the national average, and salary is more than 1,000 yuan higher than the national average.

Shaanxi Railway Institute is a member unit of the China-Russia Transportation University Presidents Union, China-Eurasian Jiaotong University Alliance, China-ASEAN Rail Transit Training Alliance, and China-Russia Cooperative University Alliance. 1 Ministry of Education Education Aid Project. Co-founded Samara Institute of Transportation with Samara State Jiaotong University, Russia, with a school size of 1,200. Actively serve the Chinese railway’s “going global” strategy, undertake training for Kenyan-Mongolian railway employees, and train 51,000 days in three years. The quality of the training has been highly praised by Kenya. “Introduced” trains railway technology for the Philippine National Railways and Kuala Lumpur Construction University, Malaysia. Teachers and students are sent to study abroad in Germany, Australia, Russia, Singapore and other countries (overseas) every year.

Shaanxi Railway Institute has formed close school-enterprise cooperation and talent supply and demand relationship with more than 300 companies. Formed 133 school-enterprise cooperation order classes and jointly trained 6,532 students. Co-established the “National Enterprise Technology R & D Base”, “Shaanxi Key Scientific and Technological Innovation Team R & D Base” and “Provincial High-Performance Concrete Engineering Laboratory” with the China Railway First Bureau, and took the lead in establishing a BIM technology application research center in the country. In the past five years, it has provided BIM technical services for more than 30 enterprises including China Railway Malaysia Company, China Railway First Bureau, etc., with a total contract value of more than 50 million yuan. BIM technical achievements have been awarded more than 50 honors at the provincial level. BIM develops advanced units. ”

Shaanxi Railway Institute has won “National Advanced Unit for Spiritual Civilization Construction”, “National Special Award for Unpaid Blood Donation”, “National First Model School for Skill Appraisal Station”, “Top Ten National Vocational Vocational School Officials”, “Top 50 International Influence”, Top 50 Educational Achievements “” Top 50 Model Colleges of Innovation and Entrepreneurship in Higher Vocational Colleges “” Top 50 Model Cases of Network Ideological and Political Innovation in Higher Vocational Colleges “” National Model Colleges for Employment Competitiveness “” National Vocational Colleges “Charming Campus” and more than 60 national honors, as well as “Shaanxi Provincial May Day Labor Award”, “Shaanxi Province Pioneering and Priority in Grassroots Party Organizations”, “Shaanxi Civilized Campus”, “Shaanxi Safe Campus”, and “Shaanxi Province Governing Schools According to Law” Demonstration school, “Shaanxi ‘Double Hundred Project’ work advanced unit” and more than 120 provincial honors. Eight times won the “First Prize of Campus Cultural Achievements in Shaanxi Province”, and won the National Campus Cultural Achievement Award for four consecutive years. For three consecutive years, he was rated as “Advanced Unit for Vocational Skills Appraisal in Shaanxi Province”, and he was awarded the “Excellent Grade” in the provincial leadership assessment for four consecutive years. The Party Committee of the Shaanxi Railway Institute won the Advanced Party Committee of the University for three consecutive years.

The recent goal of Shaanxi Railway Institute is to build the college into a high-quality vocational college that is “provincial demonstration, industry-leading, domestic first-class, and internationally renowned”. The medium and long-term goal is to strive to build the college into a railway vocational college that “leads reform, supports development, Chinese characteristics, and world-class standards.”
